thought: The website seems to be registered with the domain name "bendicomax.com". However, the registration details are private. This is a characteristic of a scam website. {

observation.reason: The website contains text that claims to be able to get an amount of money that may not be possible as well as offers unusually high profits with low minimum deposits. The domain registration details are private which is another characteristic of a scam website.
